plot: The Mexican resistance leaded by Miguel Hidalgo and Ignacio Allende are running from the Realist soldiers, ignoring that they are going into a trap, planned by the traitor Ignacio Elizondo.
title: Una Gota de Agua en el Desierto
plot_es: The Mexican resistance leaded by Miguel Hidalgo and Ignacio Allende are running from the Realist soldiers, ignoring that they are going into a trap, planned by the traitor Ignacio Elizondo.
